customErrorMessages.errorMessage: Flow Error [CLM - Program - Upsert AgreemenLine Items] - {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

Flow.description: On Section/Treaty/Covered Ceding company updates/insertions --> upserts Agreement line items attached to Program accordingly

formulas.name: lossAttachmentCALC
formulas.expression: CASE(TEXT({!eachTreaty.LossAttachment__c}), "1", "Risk Attaching", "2", "Loss Occuring", "3", "Claims Made", "4", "Risk Attaching + Loss Occurring", "5", "Risk Attaching + Claims Made", "6", "Loss Occurring + Claims Made", "7", "Risk Attaching + Loss Occurring + Claims Made", "" )

Flow.interviewLabel: Program - CLM - Upsert Agreement Line Items {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: CLM - Program - Upsert Agreement Line Items
